name: Kordanor's Cabal
description:
First, there was Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022

For which I made Larrikin of SPLORR!!

And then Kordanor played it on YT:

And he suggested that I should port it to the VIC 20.

Which sounded like a cool idea.

But VIC-20s have 3K of RAM, and my 6502 Assembly is... insufficient to the task.

So I decided to make *THIS*project instead. 

It LOOKS like a VIC-20.

And it has his name in it, which means he HAS to play it on his channel, right?
